item.title: Pokemon GO: Mega Charizard Y Raid Guide (Weaknesses, Counters & More)
item.description:
Raid bosses frequently rotate in Pokemon GO , as various special events or in-game celebrations will see these monsters coming and passing. Thankfully, this allows Trainers to battle against and capture many different kinds of Pokemon, to help build their collection.

However, with Raid bosses only being in rotation for a limited time, this leaves Trainers with a slim window to prepare suitable teams and go up against these beats in battle. To help ensure you are fully prepared to face Mega Charizard Y in Pokemon GO , knowing the key weaknesses and resistances, as well as the best counters, will come in handy. All of this information has been outlined in the guide below, to point Trainers in the right direction.

Pokemon GO: Mega Charizard Y Weakness & Resistances

In Pokemon GO , Mega Charizard is a Fire and Flying Dual-Type monster. Because of this Type combination, Mega Charizard Y will be weak to Pokemon or moves of the Electric or Water Type , and 2x weak to Rock Type moves or Pokemon. For this reason, players should prioritize using Pokemon or moves of this Type when possible, as they will deliver much more damage.

In addition to these weaknesses, Mega Charizard Y will also have some key resistances to Pokemon and moves of the Fairy, Steel, Fighting, Fire, Bug, Grass, and Ground Types . Furthermore, Mega Charizard Y's power can be increased in Windy and Sunny weather , so players may wish to avoid these Raid locations when possible to give themselves the best chance at success.

Best Mega Charizard Y Raid Counters In Pokemon GO

Mega Charizard Y has a Maximum CP of 5037 , and a stat spread of 319 ATK, 212 DEF, and 176 STA . To deal with Mega Charizard Y in battle most efficiently, Pokemon GO players will need to build a team of suitable counters with Pokemon that contain Types and moves in which Charizard has weaknesses. The best Pokemon counters have been identified below, giving players an idea of the sorts of specimens they should be bringing to battle.

Best Mega Charizard Y Counters

Pokemon

Fast Move

Charged Move

Shadow Rampardos

Smack Down

Rock Slide

Smack Down

item.title: Fallout 76: How to Get Vertibird Fuel
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get Vertibird Fuel in Fallout 76
  • How to Get Atoms in Fallout 76

In Fallout 76, the Vertibird is a special aircraft that was initially used to deliver supplies to towns. This aircraft will need special fuel in order to run, which players can obtain in order to complete a daily challenge. However, many are unsure how exactly they can get some fuel for the Vertibird.

If you are currently stuck on the 'Collect Vertibird Fuel' daily challenge and are unsure how to complete it, this guide will provide you with all of the answers you will need. This challenge currently has some bugs present that can make it difficult to figure out what to do next.

How to Get Vertibird Fuel in Fallout 76

If you notice the 'Collect Vertibird Fuel' challenge under the daily section, you are probably stuck on what to do next. Completing this challenge will give you 250 S.C.O.R.E points, so missing out on this could have an effect on your progress.

However, despite the daily challenge still being present in the game, it cannot properly be completed at the moment, since there is no Vertibird Fuel in Fallout 76 that can be obtained. Until Bethesda is able to fix this bug and completely remove the challenge, there is one solution to the problem.

Instead of attempting to track down some Vertibird Fuel in the game that does not exist, you can instead use a Re-roll to change the challenge in your daily challenge list. This seems to be the only solution at the moment, but most players will at least have one free Re-roll in their inventory that they can use. All you need to do is the following:

  • Open up your Daily Challenges from the map.
  • Find the 'Collect Vertibird Fuel' challenge, and hover your mouse over it, or scroll to it.
  • Then, press R on PC or the corresponding button on your controller to use a free Re-roll to swap out the challenge for a new one. If you've already used your free Re-roll, you will need to purchase another one using Atoms.

How to Get Atoms in Fallout 76

Obtaining a Re-Roller in Fallout 76 will cost 50 Atoms . Although this is certainly not a low price, you can obtain Atoms for free in the game if you prefer to avoid spending real money. This includes completing side quests, Lifetime Challenges, and more. Eventually, this bug will hopefully be fixed, so you will no longer have to worry about re-rolling and spending your Atoms whenever the Vertibird Fuel challenge appears. For now, just make sure to swap it out, or just move on to the other challenges available for the day.

item.title: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree Gravesite Plain Map Fragment Location
item.description:
Elden Ring: Shadow of the Ertree is finally here, and players are beginning to dive into the Realm of Shadow. The DLC is FromSoftware' s biggest work in terms of expansion, adding numerous areas, bosses, and items to collect. As there are tons of weapons and armor pieces to collect, having full access to the map is crucial.

Map fragments in Elden Ring can be collected off pillars, and the map can be opened to show exact landmarks and the whole area. This guide below shows in detail how players can get their hands on the Map Fragment for Gravesite Plain .

Where To Find Gravesite Plain Map Fragment In The Shadow Of The Erdtree

Gravesite Plain is the first area in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. To access it, players must first make sure that they have defeated Starscourge Radahn and Mohg, Lord of Blood , and teleport to the boss's Site of Grace located next to the Cocoon in the Mohgwyn Palace . Here, you can interact with an NPC who tells you to touch the withered arm in order to be transported to the Realm of Shadow. Head to the withered arm and interact with it to reach the first area in the DLC.

As soon as you arrive in the DLC, you can summon your Torrent and head out of the cave to the open area at Gravesite Plain. There is a Site of Grace located right in front of you, but opening the map, you will see the whole area to be hidden. Similarly to the base game, you will need the Map Fragment, which is located in the northeast by a small pillar symbol on the map.

Ride your torrent in that direction and be careful to avoid the enemy that drops from one of the stone gateways. Keep heading forward, and soon, you will come upon a small pillar and pick up the Map: Gravesite Plain.

item.title: Elden Ring: All Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook Locations
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Where to FInd Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 1
  • Where to Find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 2
  • Where to Find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 3
  • Where to Find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 4

Elden Ring features a vast array of crafting recipes and cookbooks. Spread throughout the Lands Between, players will find dozens of collectible books that reveal more and more crafable items. Each of these cookbooks has a theme, and the items they unlock are usually centered around this theme. In this guide, we will focus on locating all four Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbooks.

The Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbooks focus on lightning-based items, such as Lightning Grease, and Lightning Arrows. This fits with many of the most powerful dragons that exist in the world of Elden Ring. Players looking to build a Lightning-Dragon build will find no better way to create supplemental items than collecting every Anceint Dragon Apostle's Cookbook.

Where to FInd Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 1

Head to the Wyndham Catacombs in Altus Plateau

  • The first Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook is found in the Wyndham Catacombs, on the edge between the Altus Plateau and Mt. Gelmir. To reach the catacombs, you'll want to head north from the Erdtree-Gazing Hill site of grace. You'll want to pass through the Wyndham Ruins, heading northwest through the dilapidated buildings. Just outside the last building, you'll find the entrance to the catacombs built into a rock wall.
  • In the catacombs, you'll come to a section with a floor that rises into a spiked ceiling. To get this cookbook, you'll want to step on the floor to get it to rise, then get off and drop beneath the floor. You'll see three dead bodies at the end of the chamber you drop to, all with glowing item markers. Collect the items to find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 1.
  • Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [1] unlocks the following recipes: Lightning Grease , Drawstring Lightning Grease , Lightningbone Arrow , Lightningbone Arrow (Fletched) , Lightningbone Bolt .

Where to Find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 2

Head to the Forest Spanning Greatbridge in Altus Plateau

  • The second Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook is sold by the Nomadic Merchant who sits right next to the Forest Spanning Greatbridge site of grace in Altus Plateau. He sells the cookbook for 4500 Runes.
  • Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [2] unlocks the following recipes: Lightning Pot , Roped Lightning Pot .

Where to Find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 3

Head to the Cathedral of Dragon Communion in Southern Caelid

  • The third Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook is found at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion . This is found on the southwestern edge of Caelid. At the cathedral, there is the body of a small, grey dragon. Look under its right front wing to find the cookbook.
  • Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [3] unlocks the following recipe: Dragonwound Grease .

Where to Find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 4

Head to the Dragon Temple Lift Site of Grace in Crumbling Farum Azula

  • Head to the Dragon Temple Lift Site of Grace in Crumbling Farum Azula . As you work your way through the area, you'll fight the Godskin Duo bosses. Once that fight is done, you'll move on and eventually encounter a lift that is blocked by a stone gargolye seal. Unlocking the seal will cost two Stonesword Keys. Take the lift and you'll end up in an area with a lot of undead skeleton enemies. You'll want to head right, if you have faced Iron Fist Alexander, then you'll know the direction you are supposed to go in. You'll cross several broken pieces of buildings and ruins, eventually reaching a destroyed mausoleum. The cookbook is found inside the chamber, in the lab of a dead body. See the images above for the exact path to follow.
  • Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [4] unlocks the following recipes: Ancient Dragonbolt Pot , Lightningproof Dried Liver .

item.title: 7 Games With The Best Sandbox Modes, Ranked
item.description:
Highlights

  • Sandbox games offer endless creative opportunities, allowing players to shape their worlds and share their unique experiences.
  • From Fortnite Creative Mode to Minecraft's limitless potential, players can build, design, and explore with unlimited resources.
  • Even survival games like Subnautica and Grounded offer creative modes for players to enjoy building without the fear of danger.

Video games are nothing if not interactive, and many players adore the freedom these titles can offer. Few genres exemplify this sense of player freedom better than sandbox games. A good video game sandbox offers players nearly limitless resources to shape the world as they please. Some even let players design whole new video game experiences to share with their fellow fans.

Many fans are turning to creative pursuits and demonstrating some of the overwhelmingly impressive things that can be built with even the most rudimentary sandbox mechanics. In turn, many games are throwing in increasingly complex sandbox modes to let players test their creative limits. These are some of the best games with sandbox modes for fans who want to tell their own story and build their own game.

This list will also include sandbox games that incorporate additional creative modes that allow players to remove various restrictions, offering a truly freeform experience.

7 Fortnite Creative Mode

Building A Battle Royale

Fortnite Battle Royale took the world by storm back in 2017 by introducing a unique building mechanic to help set it apart from the tried and true battle royale formula. In 2018, Epic Games decided to expand these distinctive building options with the release of Fortnite Creative Mode, a subgame where players are free to build and design whatever structures and experiences they'd like and share them with friends.

Unlike some other sandbox modes, Fortnite 's Creative Mode doesn't limit itself to just elaborate builds and impressive structures. Dedicated Fortnite Creative builders have created brand-new gameplay experiences that are worth checking out in their own right, from homages to popular multiplayer games like Phasmophobia to entirely original concepts.

6 Palworld

Taming The Wilderness With Friends

While Palworld was initially dismissed as just " Pokemon with guns," its release caused a lot of stir as players realized just how much depth the game had. This survival crafting game has a lot of mechanics to explore as players build out their menagerie of strange, fantastical beasts.

Palworld technically lacks a formal sandbox mode, but it does boast an incredible number of options for world settings. This essentially lets players customize their own sandbox experience, further heightening the creative opportunities available to them in Palworld . By turning off necessary resources and danger from enemies, a Palworld player can do whatever they'd like in this strange and expansive world.

5 Subnautica

Building In The Deep

Subnautica is a very distinct take on the survival crafting genre. It forces players to survive in the middle of a vast ocean on a hostile alien planet, rich with strange and unique sea life. The game is infamous for being a lot more stressful than most survival games. Circumstances in-game are dire, and the ocean is full of dangers.

The intense nature of Subnautica makes it seem a bit odd that it features a creative mode, but this version of the game has plenty of advantages. With unlimited resources and all tech unlocked, players can freely build whatever elaborate underwater base they'd like, and happily cruise the ocean in any vehicle they want without fear of getting eaten. Given the high difficulty curve in Subnautica , the creative mode can be a great way for new players to get their bearings before they're thrown into the deep end.

4 Grounded

A Literal Sandbox

Obsidian's unique survival game Grounded strands a group of teens in a backyard populated with hostile bugs and mysterious robots. Beneath its odd premise and quirky art style lies a high-stakes survival adventure rich with terrifying insect encounters. Players will have to get uncomfortably close to some of the nastiest bugs in the yard if they want to succeed.

For more squeamish players who just want to build a tiny house in the yard, there's Creative Mode. This version disables all story quests and in exchange lets players craft whatever they'd like and freely explore the yard without risk of danger. Players can make a creative world with or without bugs, but even if the creatures are present, they'll ignore explorers completely. This sandbox mode lets fans build a charming house out of Grounded 's tiny resources without having to worry about survival.

3 No Man's Sky

Making A Mark On The Universe

The infamous No Man's Sky has developed into an excellent game through the tireless work of its developers and a constant stream of free updates. One of the many beneficiaries of this progress is the game's building system, which has seen numerous enhancements over the years, including new building pieces and tools like a convenient portal to other planets. Players can even recruit NPCs to oversee vital parts of base management like farming and tech development.

For less patient players who want to test the limits of these mechanics, No Man's Sky offers Creative Mode. This version of the game gives fans unlimited resources and free access to almost any ship in the game, including titanic capital ships. It's perfect not only for building an ideal base and decorating a capital ship but also for trying out new mechanics and ship designs to learn what works best in the main game.

2 Dragon Quest Builders 2

A Sandbox Fantasy

The Dragon Quest Builders series combines the iconic fantasy RPG mechanics of Dragon Quest with the open-ended crafting gameplay of Minecraft to fantastic effect. Dragon Quest Builders 2 iterates on the first one in several ways, particularly in how it lets players manage towns full of NPCs. The core gameplay loop of Dragon Quest Builders 2 already encourages players to explore and build at their own pace, but things truly open up after the main story.

Beating the story of Dragon Quest Builders 2 unlocks Creative Mode. Players can unlock limitless building resources and explore without restriction, letting them freely shape the islands of Dragon Quest Builders 2 in their own image. Given how much the game iterates on its predecessor, getting free reign over the world is a very fitting prize.

1 Minecraft

Offers Even More Potential In Creative Mode

In modern gaming culture, the word Minecraft is synonymous with sandbox gameplay. This iconic crafting game puts players in a virtually limitless world, generated entirely to their custom specifications, and lets them explore and build to their heart's content. Creative mode gives players limitless access to every item and resource in the game, and even allows flight, so players can build gravity-defying structures on a level that would take forever in Survival mode.

The internet is flooded with examples of some of the jaw-dropping structures fans have built in Minecraft . The game's servers, in turn, are flooded with custom game modes fans have put together using the expansive base game as a canvas. The creative freedom hiding behind Minecraft 's cute cube-based aesthetic is truly staggering, presenting a sandbox like no other.
